Metadata.Title: CVE-2022-1708 affecting package cri-o for versions less than 1.21.7-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2022-1708 affecting package cri-o for versions less than 1.21.7-1. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package cri-o is earlier than 1.21.7-1, affected by CVE-2022-1708
